For you, who love minimalism.

1. adapt UI for iPad
2. add swipe gestures: swipe up to show light mode, swipe down to show dark mode , and swipe horizontally to switch between flip clock and 25min countdown mode
3. tiny UI changes

Support for restoring the coffee within multiple devices with the same Apple ID (another cup of coffee is required)
If you already bought one cup of coffee and want to restore it on other devices, please delete and reinstall the app and buy another coffee or just buy another coffee on other devices.

Awesome Features
- More realistic flip animation

Pomodoro
- Add pause/resume function (tap)
- Add breathing light effect during breaks
- Layout optimization

Settings
- Add option for themes
- Add option to disable flip animation
- Change the maximum focus time of the pomodoro to 90 minutes.
- Redesign the guide page
- You can access the settings directly from the pomodoro and timer (swipe up)
- UI details optimization

Optimizations
- Optimize animations for landscape and portrait transitions on iPad
- Optimize flip animation on iPad
- Optimize the weekday display

Fixes
- Toggling 12/24 hours
- Loading the default focus duration of the pomodoro
- Displaying weekday on iPad
